column4: On my other PC I'm running Ubuntu 10.04 and it was working just fine but when I restarted the PC and logged in, I only got a black screen with the mouse.. I can't do anything and I can't open a terminal..
do you have more than one pc in the same network? if yes, type ssh -Y user@ip "gnome-panel& metacity&"
No, at the moment I'm on the same PC just on the live CD at the moment..
Is it safe to delete stuff in the /tmp folder?
